subject: how to lunch my Junit test case from IBM application client
msgSnippet: Hi all, I have a Junit test case. I want to lunch it from WebSphere applciation client becuase I need some environment setting. so I should have a class
messageBody:
Hi all,
I have a Junit test case. I want to lunch it from WebSphere
applciation client becuase I need some environment setting. so I
should have a class include Main. how do I call my Junittest case
from main program. Thanks a lot.

Michael
